title: Ep. 14: 'The Andy Greenwald Podcast' With Michael Schur
description:
Michael Schur, co-creator of 'Parks and Recreation,' 'Brooklyn Nine-Nine,' and the upcoming 'Good Place' joins Andy Greenwald to discuss comedy, kindness, and the state of TV.
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
